EmailTemplate.name: Part Order:Approval Process Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Part Order({!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Name}) Requires Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Part Order({!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Name}) has been submitted for your approval. Please visit the link below and either approve or reject it.
Record Link- {!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Link}
Thanks!
